title: No skin?
body: So riot gave out skins for the 10th year anniversary. I already owned Riot Kayle so I expected a new skin but I didn't get it yet. Should I wait longer or put in a support ticket?

replies.body: They will continue to give out gift until the 23rd (24th OCE time), so if you don't notice a new skin by Saturday afternoon, then send a ticket

I haven't received it either, but apparently it also said that it will take a couple of days or so to process it. The time it takes to process varies in different region, but in a week if u didn't receive then send in a support ticket.
